Lucy Isabel Goddard

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: C. E. and Isabell Chalfon
  3. Foster Family Alt: Chelfon
  4. Location of Family: Franklin, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Franklin, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 6
  8. Date of Birth: 1906-09-02, Canton, NY
  9. Gender: female
  10. Notes: In 1920 admitted to Rome (NY) State School.
  11. Source: Franklin City News, 28 June 1913; OTR 607; Children's Aid Society Corres.
